Package org.moeaframework.algorithm.sa

package org.moeaframework.algorithm.sa
Implementations of various simulated annealing (SA) algorithms.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.moeaframework.algorithm
    Implementations of various algorithms and support tools for working with algorithms.
    org.moeaframework.algorithm.continuation
    Extends an algorithm with "continuations" or "restarts", where we periodically reseed an algorithm with random solutions and optionally adjust the settings.
    org.moeaframework.algorithm.pso
    Implementations of various Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) algorithms.
    org.moeaframework.algorithm.single
    Implementations of various single-objective optimization algorithms.
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractSimulatedAnnealingAlgorithm
    Abstract class of fundamental simulated annealing algorithm.
    AMOSA
    Implementation of the simulated annealing-based multiobjective optimization algorithm (AMOSA).
    CoolingSchedule
    Defines a cooling schedule for simulated annealing algorithms.
    GeometricCoolingSchedule
    Geometric reduction rule for simulated annealing.
    TemperatureBasedTerminationCondition
    Terminates a simulated annealing algorithm when the temperature drops below a stopping, or minimum, temperature.
